title: Haven't been in a PBE Game in a week
body:
The last time I played on the PBE, I dc'd in the loading screen and by the time I reconnected, they remade. I got 5 minute low priority queues for 5 games. I'm fine with that but my queues are SO LONG. They're always 30+ minutes. I once hit 45 minutes and I just gave up. It's been a week and I can't get into a game.

[IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/34439s9.png[/IMG]

replies.body: It sucks that it's taking so long to find matches during that LPQ, but you'll need to play through those matches before the penalty goes away. Once you've played through the remainder of your low-priority queue matches, you'll be able to find games much quicker.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=F7M9MxM8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-28T23:42:52.264+0000)
>
> It sucks that it's taking so long to find matches during that LPQ, but you'll need to play through those matches before the penalty goes away. Once you've played through the remainder of your low-priority queue matches, you'll be able to find games much quicker.

So this is because of my LPQ?
I don't have your PBE Summoner name, but if you shoot that my way I can double check to be sure. I'm assuming the long wait times are due to the LPQ you mentioned you had.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=F7M9MxM8,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-28T23:51:18.979+0000)
>
> I don't have your PBE Summoner name, but if you shoot that my way I can double check to be sure. I'm assuming the long wait times are due to the LPQ you mentioned you had.

I completely forgot about this, but yeah, it was the LPQ. I finished those and my queues are fine now.
